entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 03 January 2023
